data.name: Aiursoft hosts the infrastructure on our secured servers. We are responsible for server uptime, standard backups, and basic network security.
data.value: Aiursoft 在我们安全的服务器上托管基础设施。我们负责服务器的正常运行时间、标准备份以及基本的网络安全。

data.name: AIURSOFT LIMITED
data.value: AIURSOFT LIMITED

data.name: Aiursoft provides enterprise IT infrastructure solutions built upon open-source technologies (e.g., Linux, Nextcloud, Mailcow, Authentik, GitLab).
data.value: Aiursoft 提供基于开源技术（例如，Linux、Nextcloud、Mailcow、Authentik、GitLab）的企业级 IT 基础设施解决方案。

data.name: All fees are exclusive of applicable taxes, levies, or duties imposed by taxing authorities, and you shall be responsible for payment of all such taxes.
data.value: 所有费用均不包含适用的税款、费用或由税务机关征收的关税，您须负责支付所有此类税款。

data.name: All payments are securely processed by our third-party payment gateway, Stripe. Aiursoft does not collect, process, or store your full credit card information on our servers.
data.value: 所有付款均由我们的第三方支付网关 Stripe 安全处理。Aiursoft 不会在我们的服务器上收集、处理或存储您的完整信用卡信息。

data.name: Any unauthorized access to your on-premise servers (for Startup/Enterprise plans).
data.value: 任何对您本地部署服务器的未授权访问（适用于 Startup/Enterprise 计划）。

data.name: Attempt to bypass or compromise any security measure implemented by Aiursoft on Cloud-Hosted plans.
data.value: 尝试绕过或破坏 Aiursoft 在云托管计划中实施的任何安全措施。

data.name: Automatic Renewal:
data.value: 自动续订：

data.name: Certain features, such as offline AI Knowledge Base construction or hardware-based Zero Trust authentication, may require physical hardware (e.g., NVIDIA GPUs, YubiKeys). Unless explicitly stated in a custom enterprise contract, you are responsible for procuring this hardware directly from the respective manufacturers. Aiursoft acts solely as the software integration provider.
data.value: 某些功能（例如离线AI知识库构建或基于硬件的零信任认证）可能需要物理硬件（例如，NVIDIA GPU、YubiKeys）。除非在定制的企业合同中明确说明，否则您需直接从相关制造商处采购此类硬件。Aiursoft仅作为软件集成提供商。

data.name: Cloud-Hosted Plans (e.g., Core):
data.value: 云托管计划（例如，核心版）：

data.name: Company Entity: AIURSOFT LIMITED (Hong Kong)
data.value: 公司实体：AIURSOFT LIMITED（香港）

data.name: Company:
data.value: 公司：

data.name: Data loss due to hardware failure on your self-hosted infrastructure.
data.value: 由于您自托管基础设施的硬件故障导致的数据丢失。

data.name: Effect of Cancellation:
data.value: 取消的影响：

data.name: Email:
data.value: 电子邮件：

data.name: For On-Premise plans requiring a One-Time Setup Fee, this fee covers the manual labor of our architects (e.g., network configuration, Docker deployment, Yubikey integration). Setup fees are strictly non-refundable once the deployment and configuration process has commenced.
data.value: 对于需要一次性设置费用的本地部署计划，此费用涵盖我们架构师的人工劳动（例如，网络配置、Docker 部署、Yubikey 集成）。一旦开始部署和配置流程，设置费用将严格不可退款。

data.name: How to Cancel:
data.value: 如何取消订阅：

data.name: If you cancel your subscription, the cancellation will take effect at the end of your current paid billing cycle. You will retain full access to the Services until that cycle concludes.
data.value: 如果您取消订阅，取消操作将在您当前付费账单周期结束时生效。在该周期结束前，您将继续享有对服务的完全访问权限。

data.name: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact our executive team at:
data.value: 如您对这些条款有任何疑问，请联系我们的执行团队：

data.name: In no event shall Aiursoft's aggregate liability for all claims related to the services exceed the total amount paid by you to Aiursoft for the specific service in the twelve (12) months preceding the claim.
data.value: 在任何情况下，Aiursoft 对与服务相关的所有索赔的累计责任均不得超过您在索赔前十二（12）个月内向 Aiursoft 支付的特定服务的总金额。

data.name: Last Updated: March 2026
data.value: 最后更新时间：2026年3月

data.name: No Pro-Rated Refunds:
data.value: 不提供按比例退款：

data.name: On-Premise Plans (e.g., Startup, Custom Enterprise):
data.value: 本地部署计划（例如，启动版、定制企业版）：

data.name: One-Time Setup Fees:
data.value: 一次性设置费用：

data.name: Payment Processing:
data.value: 支付处理：

data.name: Per-User Billing:
data.value: 按用户计费：

data.name: Subscription fees are calculated based on the number of active users/accounts managed within your Aiursoft Identity Gateway per billing cycle.
data.value: 订阅费用根据每个计费周期内您在 Aiursoft Identity Gateway 中管理的活跃用户/账户数量计算。

data.name: Taxes:
data.value: 税款：

data.name: Terms of Service & Subscription Agreement
data.value: 服务条款与订阅协议

data.name: The Aiursoft brand, logos, website design, and proprietary deployment scripts (e.g., Aiursoft Template orchestrations) are the intellectual property of AIURSOFT LIMITED. The underlying open-source software remains the property of their respective creators and is provided to you under their specific open-source licenses.
data.value: Aiursoft 品牌、标志、网站设计以及专有的部署脚本（例如，Aiursoft 模板编排）均为 AIURSOFT LIMITED 的知识产权。底层的开源软件仍归其各自创作者所有，并根据特定的开源许可证提供给您。

data.name: The Service is Commercial:
data.value: 服务为商业性质：

data.name: The software is deployed on your local servers or private cloud. You retain absolute physical control and ownership of your data ("Own Your Data"). Consequently, you are solely responsible for your underlying hardware, local network security, physical access control, and disaster recovery backups. Aiursoft's responsibility is limited to software-level maintenance, container updates, and technical support as defined in your plan.
data.value: 软件部署在您的本地服务器或私有云上。您对您的数据拥有绝对的物理控制权和所有权（“Own Your Data”）。因此，您需独自承担底层硬件、本地网络安全性、物理访问控制以及灾难恢复备份的责任。Aiursoft的责任仅限于软件层面的维护、容器更新以及您的计划中定义的技术支持。

data.name: The Software is Free:
data.value: 软件是免费的：

data.name: The underlying open-source codes are subject to their respective licenses (e.g., MIT, GPL). You are free to inspect, modify, and distribute the code as permitted by those licenses.
data.value: 底层的开源代码受其各自许可证（例如，MIT、GPL）的约束。您可自由地根据这些许可证允许的方式审查、修改和分发代码。

data.name: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your access to and use of the Aiursoft website, products, and subscription services, including but not limited to Aiursoft Substrate (Core, Startup, and Enterprise plans) (collectively, the "Services"). By registering for an account or purchasing a subscription, you agree to be bound by these Terms.
data.value: 服务条款（“条款”）适用于您对 Aiursoft 网站、产品及订阅服务的访问和使用，包括但不限于 Aiursoft Substrate（核心版、初创版及企业版）（统称为“服务”）。通过注册账户或购买订阅服务，您即同意受本条款约束。

data.name: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
data.value: 这些条款应受香港特别行政区法律管辖，并按其解释，而不受其法律冲突条款的影响。

data.name: To ensure uninterrupted service, our commercial plans operate on a recurring subscription basis.
data.value: 为确保服务不间断，我们的商业计划采用循环订阅模式。

data.name: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Aiursoft Limited shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from:
data.value: 在法律允许的最大范围内，Aiursoft Limited 对任何间接、偶然、特殊、后果性或惩罚性损害，或任何利润或收入的损失，无论直接或间接产生，或任何数据、使用、商誉或其他无形损失的损失，均不承担责任，该等损失源于：

data.name: Use our Cloud-Hosted email services (Mailcow) to send unsolicited spam or conduct phishing campaigns. Violation of this rule will result in immediate account termination without refund.
data.value: 不得使用我们的云托管邮件服务（Mailcow）发送未经请求的垃圾邮件或开展网络钓鱼活动。违反此规定将导致账户立即被终止且不予退款。

data.name: Use the Services to conduct any illegal, fraudulent, or malicious activities.
data.value: 不得利用服务进行任何非法、欺诈或恶意活动。

data.name: We do not provide refunds or credits for any partial-month subscription periods, or for user accounts that were provisioned but remained inactive.
data.value: 我们不为任何部分月份的订阅周期，或已分配但保持未活跃状态的用户账户提供退款或信用额度。

data.name: We may revise these Terms from time to time to better reflect changes to the law, new regulatory requirements, or improvements made to our Services. If an update affects your use of the Services or your legal rights as a user of our Services, we’ll notify you prior to the update's effective date by sending an email to the account owner.
data.value: 我们可能会不时修订这些条款，以更好地反映法律变更、新的监管要求或我们服务的改进。如果更新影响您使用服务或作为服务用户的法律权利，我们将提前通过向账户所有者发送电子邮件的方式通知您更新的有效日期前。

data.name: We offer different tiers of deployment to suit your business needs:
data.value: 我们提供不同级别的部署方案，以满足您的业务需求：

data.name: Welcome to Aiursoft. We are dedicated to bringing the spirit of open-source and free software to every enterprise and individual.
data.value: 欢迎使用 Aiursoft。我们致力于将开源和自由软件的精神带给每一个企业与个人。

data.name: What you are purchasing from Aiursoft is the hosting, automated deployment, maintenance, priority support, and enterprise integration of these tools.
data.value: 您从 Aiursoft 购买的是这些工具的托管服务、自动化部署、维护服务、优先支持以及企业级集成服务。

data.name: You agree not to misuse the Services or help anyone else to do so. You must not:
data.value: 您同意不得滥用服务或帮助他人滥用服务。您不得：

data.name: You may cancel your subscription at any time through your Aiursoft Billing Dashboard or by contacting our support team.
data.value: 您可随时通过您的 Aiursoft 订阅管理仪表板取消订阅，或联系我们的支持团队。

data.name: Your access to or use of or inability to access or use the Services.
data.value: 您对服务的访问或使用，或无法访问或使用服务

data.name: Your subscription will automatically renew at the end of each billing cycle (monthly or annually) unless you cancel it prior to the renewal date. You authorize us (via Stripe) to charge the applicable subscription fees to your payment method on file.
data.value: 您的订阅将在每个计费周期结束时自动续订，除非您在续订日期前取消。您授权我们（通过 Stripe）向您留存的付款方式收取相应的订阅费用。
